itemDescription: British palaeontologist, marine biologist and scientific illustrator (1797-1857)

wikipedia_page.main: Mary Buckland (née Morland; 20 November 1797 – 30 November 1857) was an English palaeontologist, marine biologist and scientific illustrator.
